00043 typedef enum {
00044     UVM_SC_STOP,
00045     UVM_NO_SC_STOP
00046 } stop_mode_enum;
00047 
00048 typedef enum {
00049     UVM_STOP_REASON_DURATION_COMPLETE,
00050     UVM_STOP_REASON_GLOBAL_TIMEOUT,
00051     UVM_STOP_REASON_PHASE_COMPLETE,
00052     UVM_STOP_REASON_USER_REQUEST,
00053     UVM_STOP_REASON_PRERUN_PHASE_FATAL,
00054     UVM_STOP_REASON_POSTRUN_PHASE_FATAL,
00055     UVM_STOP_REASON_RUN_PHASE_FATAL,
00056     UVM_STOP_REASON_MAX_ERRORS
00057 } stop_reason_enum;

00060 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 //
00062 // CLASS: uvm_phase_controller
00063 //
00064 // Internal implementation class.
00065 // Stand-alone phase controller for UVM-SC
00066 // A singleton instance of this class is created for a given simulation run.
00067 //
00068 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 
00076 class uvm_phase_controller;
00077 typedef uvm_phase_controller *puvm_phase_controller;
00078 
00079 
00080 class uvm_phase_controller {
00081 public:
00082 
00083     static uvm_phase_controller* get_phase_controller();
00084 
00085     bool add_schedule(uvm_schedule* schedule);
00086     const std::vector<uvm_schedule*> get_schedules(void);
00087     uvm_schedule* get_schedule_by_name(std::string name);
00088 
00089     stop_reason_enum start(void);        // active mode only
00090     // TODO - should this be moved from uvm_schedule?
00091     //stop_reason execute_phase(pscheule, pphase, pstate, pmod);  // active mode only
00092 
00093     void set_stop_mode(stop_mode_enum mode = UVM_SC_STOP);
00094     void set_global_timeout(sc_core::sc_time t);
00095     void set_duration(sc_core::sc_time t);
00096 
00097     // Temporarily allow users to stop run - normally a protected method
00098     void stop_run(stop_reason_enum reason);
00099 
00100     stop_mode_enum   get_stop_mode(void);
00101     sc_core::sc_time get_global_timeout(void);
00102     sc_core::sc_time get_duration(void);
00103 
00104 
00105 protected:
00106 
00107     uvm_phase_controller();
00108     ~uvm_phase_controller();
00109 
00110     void do_prerun();
00111     void do_run();
00112     void do_postrun();
00113     
00114 
00115     void wait_for_global_timeout();
00116     void wait_for_run_phases();
00117 
00118     void print_stop_reason(stop_reason_enum reason);
00119   
00120 protected:
00121 
00122     static uvm_phase_controller* m_phase_controller;
00123          
00124     stop_mode_enum                  m_stop_mode;
00125     stop_reason_enum                m_stop_reason;  
00126     sc_core::sc_time                m_global_timeout;
00127     sc_core::sc_time                m_duration;
00128     sc_core::sc_join                m_join_run;
00129     std::vector<uvm_schedule*>      m_schedules;
00130 
00131     uvm_common_schedule * m_pcommon_schedule;
00132     uvm_common_schedule * m_puvm_schedule;
00133 
00134 };
00135 
00136 inline
00137 uvm_phase_controller* get_uvm_phase_controller() {
00138     return uvm_phase_controller::get_phase_controller();
00139 }
